You can be provided data in the form of xml, table, meaning representations, graphs etc.

final_response: Agremiação Sportiva Arapiraquense, whose full name is Agremiação Sportiva Arapiraquense, competes in the Campeonato Brasileiro Série C. The club has 17,000 members. Vila Nova Futebol Clube are the champions of the Campeonato Brasileiro Série C.
